required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Estimation of Dynamics of Humoral and Cellular Immunity in COVID-19 Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Estimation of Dynamics of Humoral and Cellular Immunity in COVID-19 Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus

collaborator.agency: The Republican Research and Practical Center for Epidemiology and Microbiology

clinical_study.source: Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus

brief_summary.textblock: The goal of the project: to study the dynamics of the humoral and cellular immunity in patients after pneumonia caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus at different time intervals, in order to predict the duration of immune protection

primary_outcome.measure: The dynamics of humoral and cellular immunity
primary_outcome.description: The dynamics of both humoral and cellular immunity in response to COVID-19 infection

study_pop.textblock: Patients recovered from the COVID-19 associated pneumonia (moderate and severe)

facility.name: Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus
